name: ang
description: minimal angular + package.json + purecss start code

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp index.html dist
scripts.concat: concat-cli -f src/**.js -o dist/tmp.js && ng-annotate -a dist/tmp.js -o dist/tmp2.js
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs dist/tmp2.js -o dist/tmp3.js -m --screw-ie8 && concat-cli -f node_modules/angular/angular.min.js dist/tmp3.js -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.build:js: npm run eslint && npm run concat && npm run uglify
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:js && npm run build:images
